alert.note: Alert for Modoc County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 18 at 8:57PM PDT until May 19 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...West to northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 45 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...The Warner Mountains in Modoc County. Cedar Pass on Highway 299 is likely to gust 35 to 45 mph. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around or damage unsecured objects. Driving may become difficult for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds are likely to occur between 2 AM and 8 AM PDT. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
